attributes.title: Too many ads and it glitches like crazy.
attributes.review: This app is so hard to use, so many ads and it has a lot of bugs. My friend also had the same experience. Plus the ads were about roaches and flies dancing to a ritual while sacrificing a dog. That’s animal abuse. This app is so bad it needs to be taken off the App Store ASAP. Thank you and I hope I never see this app again. - Gen Z

attributes.title: Worst app ever !!!
attributes.review: It gave my phone a horrible virus which turned everything orange!!!! It also scammed me out of my money and everything I owned it ruined my life now I have nothing left but my phone which it gave a virus!!! This app is so slow all it does it glitch all the time!!!! It makes my phone overheat!!! Hate this app it is a disgrace to America!!! Needs to be deleted immediately!!!👿👿

attributes.title: So stressful 😔
attributes.review: as I downloaded this app, my entire phone just shut down. It took three days, and 200 dollars to turn it back on. As I got on, the app was still not yet downloaded, it took a total of 4 additional hours to download. After that, It wouldn’t let me enter my phone number. I ended up just deleting it. This app is a godamn disgrace to our country. I’m in tears.

attributes.title: This app is absolutely disgusting now I have to throw my phone across the Pacific Ocean
attributes.review: Absolutely horrible it killed my dog and gave my friend aids all this app has caused for me is pain DO NOT DOWNLOAD the app itself glitches on every phone I try downloading it on anyway Bc of how ugly trump is and Bc the app doesn’t like pedophiles it is incredibly disgusting and negative  makes me throw up in my mouth RIP BALOONGA🤢🤢🤢🤮🤮🤮🤮🤮🤮🤮🤮🤮🤮🤮🤮🤮🤮🤮🤮🤮🤮🤮🤮🤮🤮😷😷😷🤮🤢🤢🤮🤢🤢🤢🤢🤢🤢🤢🤢🤢🤢🥴🤢🤢🤮🤮🤢🤢🥴

attributes.title: no✨❤️ stan American Football
attributes.review:
Let's just forget
Everything said
Everything we did
Best friends and better halves
Goodbyes
And the autumn night when we realized
We were falling out of love
(There were some things that were said that weren't Let's just forget
Everything said
Everything we did
Best friends and better halves
Goodbyes
And the autumn night when we realized
We were falling out of love
(There were some things that were said that weren't meant)
But we never did
Not to be
Overly dramatic
I just think it's best
'Cause you can't miss what you forget
So lets just pretend
Everything and
Anything between you and me
Was never meant

attributes.title: dOnT down load I had to get a new phone
attributes.review: This app took so long to download and the first thing u see is a ugly looking orange 🍊 I hate oranges 🤢this app is disgusting also the orange has a lot of rankles I think it is rotten it looks gross everyone around me started crying when they saw this disgusting orange thing on the screen I had to throw my phone away and get a whole new one because of this

attributes.title: I love TikTok
attributes.review: President 🍊your app is horrible it doesn’t run smoothly and took 81%of my battery when I just downloaded it and took 3 days to download ,this app is not it ✨✨and taking down tiktok is not the way to do it tiktok is a very well used app with over 50 mil people and you want to take it down ? TikTok is the only good app during this pandemic your app is slow 🙄enjoy your horrible life p. dump 🍊

attributes.title: horrible
attributes.review: first of all, why is it age restricted??? if you are the president and if you are being televised everyday and tweeting, then little kids should be able to get the app. goes to show he can only get boomers. second, i almost died on this app. it asked for my location??! why?! my inner karen is infuriated. get this app out of america!!! it’s a threat and the THUGS that promote it are apart of a cult! cults are strictly forbidden. smh.

attributes.title: Gave me PTSD
attributes.review: Just finding out this app exists made me nauseated. Let alone when I downloaded it and seeing an orange on my screen probably brought my phones value down my 90%. After I recovered from this blow I went back and tried to delete it before it caused anymore damage. It then caused a relapse of trauma and I hope I will never see anything associated with the orange again.

attributes.title: WORST APP EVER
attributes.review: Ok so I wanted to download this app to support America’s amazing president but it took forever to downloading and my internet is great. Once it was download I went into the app to find myself with 35 viruses!!!!! Please don’t download your personal information could be at risk!!!! So I deleted the app after that and found myself it won’t delete and I had to restart my whole phone so please please DO NOT DOWNLOAD!!!!!
